Outer namespace of library

Functions

double getEuclidean(double vector1[], double vector2[], int size1, int size2)

Function that computes the Euclidean distance. Uses the implementation of Minkowski distance with a p value set as 2

Parameters

  • vector1 –

  • vector2 –

  • size1 – size of vector1

  • size2 – size of vector2

Returns

floating point result

double getMinkowski(double vector1[], double vector2[], int size1, int size2, double pvalue)

Function that computes the distance between vector 1 and vector 2 Uses Minkowski distance (∑(Xi−Yi)^p)^1/p

Parameters

  • vector1 –

  • vector2 –

  • size1 – size of vector1

  • size2 – size of vector2

  • pvalue – pvalue

Returns

floating point result

double getManhattan(double vector1[], double vector2[], int size1, int size2)

Function that computes the Manhattan distance. Uses the implementation of Minkowski distance with a p value set as 1

Parameters

  • vector1 –

  • vector2 –

  • size1 – size of vector1

  • size2 – size of vector2

Returns

floating point result

double getChebyshev(double vector1[], double vector2[], int size1, int size2)

Parameters

  • vector2 –

  • vector1 –

  • vector2 –

  • size1 – size of vector1

  • size2 – size of vector2

Returns

floating point result
